        sit_on_couch(couch)

behavior use_remote_control(remote_control:item, tv:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, remote_control)
        achieve facing_char(char, tv)
        turn_on_tv_with_remote(remote_control, tv)

behavior __goal__():
